sourcesContent:
import Category from '../models/category';
import Meal from '../models/meal';

export const CATEGORIES = [
  new Category('c1', 'Breakfast', '#f5428d'),
  new Category('c2', 'Lunch', '#f54242'),
  new Category('c3', 'Dinner', '#f5a442'),
  new Category('c4', 'Fast Food', '#f5d142'),
  new Category('c5', 'Drinks', '#368dff'),
  new Category('c6', 'Sweet dishes', '#41d95d'),
  new Category('c7', 'Chinese', '#9eecff'),
  new Category('c8', 'Bread', '#b9ffb0'),
];

export const MEALS = [
new Meal(
    'm1',
    ['c1'],
    'Sandwich',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/sandwich.jpg',
    10,
    [
      'Bread slices',
      'Sliced deli meat (e.g., turkey, ham, chicken)',
      'Cheese slices',
      'Lettuce leaves',
      'Tomato slices',
      'Cucumber slices',
      'Mayonnaise',
      'Mustard',
      'Salt and pepper to taste'
    ],
    [
      'Take two slices of bread.',
      'Spread mayonnaise on one side of each bread slice.',
      'Layer the deli meat on one bread slice.',
      'Place cheese slices on top of the deli meat.',
      'Add lettuce leaves, tomato slices, and cucumber slices.',
      'Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.',
      'Optionally, add mustard on the other bread slice.',
      'Place the second bread slice with the mustard side down on top of the sandwich.',
      'Press gently to secure the ingredients together.',
      'Cut the sandwich into halves or quarters.',
      'Serve and enjoy!'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    true
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm2',
    ['c1'],
    'Chocolate bread and coffee',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/sandwich.jpg',
    15,
    [
      'Bread slices (e.g., sandwich bread)', 
       'chocolate (nutella, chocobliss)',
        'coffee',
        'milk',
        'cream',
    ],
    [
      'Take two slices of bread.',
      'make a toast of them.',
      'Spread chocolate on one side of each bread slice.',
      'Sprinkle choco chips to taste.',
      'Serve and enjoy!',
      'For coffee',
      'Boil water and measure 1 tablespoon of ground coffee per 6 ounces of water.',
      'Place coffee grounds in a filter or coffee makers basket.',
      'Slowly pour hot water over the grounds, allowing them to bloom for 30 seconds.',
      'Let the water drip through and stir the coffee before serving.',
      'Customize with sugar,milk, or other flavorings to taste. Enjoy your coffee!',
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    true
  ), 
  new Meal(
    'm3',
    ['c1'],
    'Aloo paratha',
    'difficult',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/sandwich.jpg',
    30,
    [
      ' wheat flour', 
       'salt',
        'oil or ghee (clarified butter)',
        'Water (as needed for kneading the dough)',
        ' potatoes boiled and mashed',
        ' onion, finely chopped',
         '1 teaspoon of grated ginger',
         '1 teaspoon of cumin seeds',
         '1/2 teaspoon of red chili powder (adjust according to your preference)',
         '1/2 teaspoon of turmeric powder',
         '1/2 teaspoon of garam masala',
         'Salt to taste',
         'Fresh coriander leaves, chopped (optional)',
    ],
    [
        'Prepare the dough by combining whole wheat flour, salt, and oil/ghee. Knead it with water until a soft, non-sticky dough forms. Let it rest for 15-20 minutes.',

        'Make the potato filling by mixing mashed potatoes, finely chopped onion, green chilies, grated ginger, spices (cumin seeds, red chili powder, turmeric powder, garam masala), salt, and chopped coriander leaves.',
        
        'Take a small dough ball, roll it into a circle, and place a spoonful of the potato filling in the center. Seal the edges, flatten, and roll it out into a round paratha.',
        
        'Heat a tawa or griddle over medium heat and cook the paratha on both sides, applying ghee/oil, until golden brown spots appear.',
    
       'Repeat the process with the remaining dough and filling. Serve the hot Aloo Parathas with yogurt, pickle, or chutney of your choice.',
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    true
  ), 

  new Meal(
    'm4',
    ['c1'],
    'omelate bread',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/sandwich.jpg',
    20,
    [
      'Bread slices',
      'Sliced deli meat (e.g., turkey, ham, chicken)',
      'Cheese slices',
      'Lettuce leaves',
      'Tomato slices',
      'Cucumber slices',
      'Mayonnaise',
      'Mustard',
      'Salt and pepper to taste',
      'Eggs'
    ],
    [
      'Take two slices of bread.',
      'Spread mayonnaise on one side of each bread slice.',
      'Layer the deli meat on one bread slice.',
      'Place cheese slices on top of the deli meat.',
      'Add lettuce leaves, tomato slices, and cucumber slices.',
      'Sprinkle salt and pepper to taste.',
      'Optionally, add mustard on the other bread slice.',
      'Place the second bread slice with the mustard side down on top of the sandwich.',
      'Press gently to secure the ingredients together.',
      'For the omelette, beat eggs with salt and pepper.',
      'Heat a non-stick pan and pour the beaten eggs to make an omelette.',
      'Place the omelette on top of the sandwich.',
      'Cut the sandwich into halves or quarters.',
      'Serve and enjoy!'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    true
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm5',
    ['c1'],
    'Cheese Paratha',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/cheese_paratha.jpg',
    20,
    [
      '2 cups Whole Wheat Flour',
      '1/2 tsp Salt',
      'Water as needed',
      '1 cup Grated Cheese (cheddar or mozzarella)',
      '1/2 tsp Red Chili Flakes',
      '1/2 tsp Dried Oregano',
      '1/2 tsp Dried Basil',
      'Salt to taste',
      'Oil or ghee for frying'
    ],
    [
      'In a mixing bowl, combine whole wheat flour and salt. Gradually add water and knead to form a soft dough.',
      'Cover the dough and let it rest for 15-20 minutes.',
      'In a separate bowl, mix grated cheese, red chili flakes, dried oregano, dried basil, and salt.',
      'Divide the dough into small balls and roll each ball into a small circle.',
      'Place a portion of the cheese mixture in the center of the circle.',
      'Bring the edges of the dough together and seal it to form a ball.',
      'Flatten the ball and roll it gently into a paratha.',
      'Heat a tawa or griddle and cook the paratha on both sides until golden brown, applying oil or ghee as needed.',
      'Serve hot with raita or ketchup.'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    true
  ),
  new Meal(
    'm6',
    ['c2'],
    'Chicken Biryani',
    'affordable',
    'difficult',
    'challenging',
    'https://www.example.com/chicken_biryani.jpg',
    60,
    [
      '1 kg Chicken',
      '500g Basmati Rice',
      '2 Onions',
      '4 Tomatoes',
      '1 cup Yogurt',
      '2 tbsp Biryani Masala',
      '1 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '1 cup Fried Onions',
      '1/2 cup Mint Leaves',
      '1/2 cup Coriander Leaves',
      '4 cups Water',
      'Salt to taste'
    ],
    [
      'Marinate chicken with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, and salt. Let it sit for 30 minutes.',
      'In a separate pan, heat oil and fry onions until golden brown. Remove half of the fried onions and set aside for garnishing.',
      'In the same pan, add tomatoes, biryani masala, turmeric powder, and cook until the tomatoes are soft.',
      'Add marinated chicken to the pan and cook until the chicken is tender.',
      'In a separate pot, boil water and cook basmati rice until it is 70% cooked. Drain the rice.',
      'Layer the partially cooked rice over the chicken in the pan. Sprinkle fried onions, mint leaves, and coriander leaves on top.',
      'Cover the pan and cook on low heat for 20-25 minutes until the rice is fully cooked and flavors are infused.',
      'Serve hot with raita or salad.'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    true
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm7',
    ['c2'],
    'Chicken Karahi',
    'affordable',
    'difficult',
    'https://www.example.com/chicken_karahi.jpg',
    40,
    [
      '1 kg Chicken',
      '4 Tomatoes',
      '3-4 Green Chilies',
      '2 Onions',
      '1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '1 tbsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Cumin Powder',
      '1 tsp Coriander Powder',
      '1/2 cup Yogurt',
      '1/4 cup Fresh Coriander Leaves',
      'Salt to taste',
      'Oil for cooking'
    ],
    [
      'Heat oil in a karahi or deep pan. Add sliced onions and cook until golden brown.',
      'Add ginger-garlic paste and cook for a minute.',
      'Add chicken pieces and cook until they change color.',
      'Add chopped tomatoes, red chili powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, and coriander powder. Cook until the tomatoes are soft.',
      'Add yogurt and salt. Mix well and cook for 5-7 minutes until the oil separates.',
      'Add green chilies and fresh coriander leaves. Cook for another 2-3 minutes.',
      'Serve hot with naan or rice.'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    false
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm8',
    ['c2'],
    'Chicken Tikka',
    'affordable',
    'simple',
    'https://www.example.com/chicken_tikka.jpg',
    30,
    [
      '500g Chicken Pieces (boneless)',
      '1/2 cup Yogurt',
      '2 tbsp Lemon Juice',
      '2 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '2 tsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Cumin Powder',
      '1 tsp Coriander Powder',
      '1 tsp Garam Masala',
      'Salt to taste',
      '2 tbsp Oil',
      'Skewers for grilling'
    ],
    [
      'In a mixing bowl, combine yogurt, lemon juice, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala, and salt to make a marinade.',
      'Add chicken pieces to the marinade and mix well. Let it marinate for at least 2 hours or overnight in the refrigerator.',
      'Preheat the grill or oven to medium-high heat.',
      'Thread marinated chicken pieces onto skewers and brush them with oil.',
      'Grill the chicken skewers for 10-15 minutes, turning occasionally, until the chicken is cooked and slightly charred.',
      'Serve hot with mint chutney and naan.'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    false
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm9',
    ['c2'],
    'Vegetable Biryani',
    'affordable',
    'challenging',
    'https://www.example.com/vegetable_biryani.jpg',
    60,
    [
      '2 cups Basmati Rice',
      '1 cup Mixed Vegetables (carrots, peas, beans, etc.)',
      '1 Onion (thinly sliced)',
      '2 Tomatoes (chopped)',
      '2 Green Chilies (slit)',
      '1/4 cup Yogurt',
      '2 tsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '1 tsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1/2 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Cumin Powder',
      '1 tsp Coriander Powder',
      '1 tsp Garam Masala',
      'A pinch of Saffron strands (soaked in milk)',
      '4 cups Water',
      '4 tbsp Ghee or Oil',
      'Salt to taste',
      'Fresh Coriander Leaves (for garnish)',
      'Fried Onions (for garnish)',
      'Mint Leaves (for garnish)'
    ],
    [
      'Wash the rice in cold water and soak it for 30 minutes.',
      'In a large pan, heat ghee or oil over medium heat.',
      'Add sliced onions and sauté until they turn golden brown and crispy. Remove half of the fried onions for garnishing.',
      'In the same pan, add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.',
      'Add chopped tomatoes, green chilies, red chili powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook until the tomatoes are soft.',
      'Add mixed vegetables and yogurt. Mix well and cook for 5 minutes.',
      'Drain the soaked rice and add it to the pan. Mix gently to combine.',
      'Add water and saffron strands soaked in milk. Bring it to a boil, then reduce the heat, cover the pan, and let it cook for 10-15 minutes or until the rice is fully cooked and the flavors are infused.',
      'Garnish with fried onions, fresh coriander leaves, and mint leaves. Serve hot with raita or salad.'
    ],
    true,
    false,
    false,
    false
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm10',
    ['c2'],
    'Haleem',
    'affordable',
    'difficult',
    'challenging',
    'https://www.example.com/haleem.jpg',
    100,
    [
      '1 cup Boneless Chicken or Beef (cooked and shredded)',
      '1 cup Broken Wheat (Dalia)',
      '1/4 cup Yellow Split Peas (Chana Dal)',
      '1/4 cup Split Red Lentils (Masoor Dal)',
      '1/4 cup Split Bengal Gram (Chana Dal)',
      '1 Onion (thinly sliced)',
      '2 Tomatoes (chopped)',
      '2 Green Chilies (slit)',
      '2 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '1 tsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1/2 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Cumin Powder',
      '1 tsp Coriander Powder',
      '1 tsp Garam Masala',
      '4 cups Water or Chicken/Beef Stock',
      '4 tbsp Ghee or Oil',
      'Salt to taste',
      'Fresh Coriander Leaves (for garnish)',
      'Fried Onions (for garnish)',
      'Ginger Julienne (for garnish)',
      'Lemon wedges (for serving)'
    ],
    [
      'Wash broken wheat, yellow split peas, split red lentils, and split bengal gram. Soak them in water for 1 hour.',
      'In a large pan or pressure cooker, heat ghee or oil over medium heat.',
      'Add sliced onions and sauté until they turn golden brown and crispy. Remove half of the fried onions for garnishing.',
      'In the same pan, add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.',
      'Add chopped tomatoes, green chilies, red chili powder, turmeric powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, garam masala, and salt. Cook until the tomatoes are soft.',
      'Add soaked broken wheat and lentils mixture, shredded chicken or beef, and water or stock. Mix well.',
      'If using a pressure cooker, close the lid and cook for 30-40 minutes until the grains and lentils are completely soft and mashed. If using a pan, cover and simmer for 2-3 hours, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed.',
      'Once the haleem reaches the desired consistency, garnish with fried onions, fresh coriander leaves, and ginger julienne.',
      'Serve hot with lemon wedges and naan.'
    ],
    false,
    true,
    false,
    false
  ),

  new Meal(
    'm11',
    ['c3'],
    'Nihari',
'expensive',
    'luxurious',
    'challenging',
    'https://www.example.com/nihari.jpg',
    120,
    [
      '500g Beef Shank or Lamb (with bone)',
      '2 Onions (thinly sliced)',
      '2 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '1/4 cup Wheat Flour (Atta)',
      '2 tbsp Nihari Masala Powder',
      '1 tsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1/2 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Coriander Powder',
      '1 tsp Garam Masala',
      '1/2 cup Ghee or Oil',
      '4 cups Water',
      'Salt to taste',
      'Ginger Julienne (for garnish)',
      'Fresh Coriander Leaves (for garnish)',
      'Fried Onions (for garnish)',
      'Lemon wedges (for serving)'
    ],
    [
      'Heat ghee or oil in a large pan or pressure cooker over medium heat.',
      'Add sliced onions and sauté until they turn golden brown.',
      'Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute.',
      'Add beef shank or lamb pieces and cook until they are browned.',
      'In a separate bowl, mix wheat flour with some water to make a smooth paste (slurry).',
      'Add nihari masala powder, red chili powder, turmeric powder, coriander powder, garam masala, and salt to the meat. Mix well.',
      'Add the wheat flour slurry and water to the pan. Mix again.',
      'If using a pressure cooker, close the lid and cook for 4-5 whistles or until the meat is tender. If using a pan, cover and simmer for 4-5 hours, stirring occasionally and adding more water if needed.',
      'Garnish with ginger julienne, fresh coriander leaves, and fried onions.',
      'Serve hot with naan or rice, and lemon wedges.'
    ],
    false,
    true,
    false,
    false
  ),
  new Meal(
    'm12',
    ['c3'],
    'Palak Ghost',
    'affordable',
    'easy to make',
    'https://www.example.com/palak_ghost.jpg',
    60,
    [
      '500g Mutton (preferably with bones)',
      '2 cups Spinach (palak)',
      '2 Onions (finely chopped)',
      '2 Tomatoes (finely chopped)',
      '2 Green Chilies (slit lengthwise)',
      '1 tbsp Ginger-Garlic Paste',
      '1/2 tsp Turmeric Powder',
      '1 tsp Red Chili Powder',
      '1 tsp Cumin Powder',
      '1 tsp Coriander Powder',
      '1 tsp Garam Masala',
      'Salt to taste',
      'Oil or ghee for cooking'
    ],
    [
      'In a pressure cooker, heat oil or ghee over medium heat.',
      'Add chopped onions and sauté until they turn golden brown.',
      'Add ginger-garlic paste and sauté for a minute until fragrant.',
      'Add chopped tomatoes and cook until they turn soft.',
      'Add mutton pieces and sauté for a few minutes until they are browned.',
      'Add turmeric powder, red chili powder, cumin powder, coriander powder, and salt. Mix well.',
      'Add water as needed to cover the mutton.',
      'Close the pressure cooker and cook the mutton until tender (about 4-5 whistles).',
      'Once the pressure is released, open the cooker and add spinach (palak).',
      'Cook for a few minutes until the spinach wilts and blends well with the mutton.',
      'Sprinkle garam masala and adjust the seasoning if needed.',
      'Simmer for a few more minutes.',
      'Serve hot with rice or roti.'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    true,
    false
  ),
  
  
  new Meal(
    'm13',
    ['c3'],
    'vegetable fried rice',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/dam_phookt.jpg',
    45,
    [
        '2 cups cooked rice (preferably leftover rice)',
        '1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn, bell peppers, etc.)',
        '1/2 cup diced onions',
        '1/2 cup diced carrots',
        '1/2 cup diced bell peppers',
        '2 cloves garlic, minced',
        '2 tablespoons soy sauce',
        '1 tablespoon oyster sauce (optional)',
        '1 tablespoon sesame oil',
        '2 tablespoons vegetable oil',
        '2 eggs, beaten',
        'Salt and pepper to taste',
        'Green onions, chopped (for garnish)'
    ],
    [
        'Heat vegetable oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.',
  'Add diced onions, carrots, bell peppers, and minced garlic. Stir-fry for a few minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.',
  'Push the vegetables to one side of the pan and add the beaten eggs to the other side. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked.',
  'Combine the cooked eggs with the vegetables and add the cooked rice and mixed vegetables. Stir-fry everything together for a few minutes.',
  'Drizzle soy sauce, oyster sauce (if using), and sesame oil over the rice. Mix well to evenly coat the rice and vegetables.',
  'Season with salt and pepper to taste. Adjust the seasoning and sauce according to your preference.',
  'Continue stir-frying for a few more minutes until the fried rice is heated through and well combined.',
  'Remove from heat and garnish with chopped green onions.',
  'Serve the delicious fried rice hot and enjoy'
    ],
    false,
    false,
    false,
    false
  ),
  new Meal(
    'm14',
    ['c3'],
    'Chicken fried rice',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/dam_phookt.jpg',
    60,
    [
  '2 cups cooked rice (preferably leftover rice)',
  '1 cup cooked chicken breast, diced',
  '1 cup mixed vegetables (carrots, peas, corn, bell peppers, etc.)',
  '1/2 cup diced onions',
  '1/2 cup diced carrots',
  '1/2 cup diced bell peppers',
  '2 cloves garlic, minced',
  '2 tablespoons soy sauce',
  '1 tablespoon oyster sauce (optional)',
  '1 tablespoon sesame oil',
  '2 tablespoons vegetable oil',
  '2 eggs, beaten',
  'Salt and pepper to taste',
  'Green onions, chopped (for garnish)'
    ],
    [
  'Heat vegetable oil in a large pan or wok over medium-high heat.',
  'Add diced onions, carrots, bell peppers, and minced garlic. Stir-fry for a few minutes until the vegetables are slightly tender.',
  'Push the vegetables to one side of the pan and add the beaten eggs to the other side. Scramble the eggs until they are cooked.',
  'Combine the cooked eggs with the vegetables and add the cooked rice, diced chicken, and mixed vegetables. Stir-fry everything together for a few minutes.',
  'Drizzle soy sauce, oyster sauce (if using), and sesame oil over the rice. Mix well to evenly coat the rice, chicken, and vegetables.',
  'Season with salt and pepper to taste. Adjust the seasoning and sauce according to your preference.',
  'Continue stir-frying for a few more minutes until the fried rice is heated through and well combined.',
  'Remove from heat and garnish with chopped green onions.',
  'Serve the delicious Chicken Fried Rice hot and enjoy!'
],
false,
false,
false,
false
),




new Meal(
    'm15',
    ['c4'],
    'Burger and fries',
    'affordable',
    'easy',
    'https://www.example.com/dam_phookt.jpg',
    30,
    [
        'Ground beef or chicken patty',
        'Burger buns',
        'Lettuce leaves',
        'Tomato slices',
        'Onion slices',
        'Cheese slices',
        'Pickles',
        'Ketchup',
        'Mustard',
        'Mayonnaise',
        'Salt and pepper to taste',
        'Potatoes',
        'Vegetable oil for frying',
        'Salt to taste'
    ],
    [
  'Preheat grill or stovetop pan to medium-high heat.',
  'Season the ground beef or chicken patty with salt and pepper.',
  'Grill or cook the patty until it reaches your desired level of doneness.',
  'Slice the burger buns in half and lightly toast them on the grill or in a toaster.',
  'Spread ketchup, mustard, and mayonnaise on the bottom bun.',
  'Layer lettuce leaves, tomato slices, onion slices, pickles, and cheese on top of the sauce.',
  'Place the cooked patty on top of the cheese and stack the burger together.',
  'Peel and cut potatoes into thin strips or desired shape.',
  'Soak the potato strips in cold water for about 30 minutes to remove excess starch.',
  'Drain the potatoes and pat them dry with a clean kitchen towel.',
  'Heat vegetable oil in a deep fryer or large pot to about 350°F (175°C).',
  'Carefully add the potatoes to the hot oil and fry them until they turn golden brown and crispy.',
  'Remove the fries from the oil and drain them on a paper towel to remove excess oil.',
  'Season the fries with salt to taste.',
  'Serve the delicious fries alongside the burger and enjoy!' 
],
false,
false,
false,
false
),

new Meal(
    'm17',
    ['c4'],
    'pizaa',
    'expensive',
    'challenging',
    'https://www.example.com/dam_phookt.jpg',
    45,
    [
            'Pizza dough',
            'Tomato sauce',
            'Mozzarella cheese',
            'Toppings of your choice (e.g., pepperoni, mushrooms, bell peppers, onions)',
            'Olive oil',
            'Dried oregano',
            'Salt and pepper to taste'
        ],
        [
            'Preheat the oven to the specified temperature (usually 475°F or 245°C).',
            'Roll out the pizza dough on a floured surface to your desired thickness.',
            'Transfer the rolled-out dough to a baking sheet or pizza stone.',
            'Spread a generous amount of tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a border around the edges.',
            'Sprinkle mozzarella cheese over the sauce, covering the entire pizza.',
            'Add your preferred toppings, distributing them evenly across the pizza.',
            'Drizzle a little olive oil over the toppings to enhance the flavor.',
            'Season with dried oregano, salt, and pepper according to your taste.',
            'Place the pizza in the preheated oven and bake for the specified time, usually around 12-15 minutes, or until the crust turns golden brown and the cheese is melted and bubbly.',
            'Remove the pizza from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.',
            'Slice the pizza into wedges or squares, and serve hot.',
            'Enjoy your homemade pizza!'
        ],
false,
false,
false,
false
),
new Meal(
    'm18',
    ['c4'],
    'loaded fries',
    'affordable',
    'difficult',
    'https://www.example.com/dam_phookt.jpg',
    30,
    [
        'Frozen French fries',
        'Shredded cheese',
        'Bacon bits',
        'Green onions (chopped)',
        'Sour cream',
        'Ketchup',
        'Salt and pepper to taste'
    ],
    [
        'Preheat the oven to the specified temperature for the frozen French fries.',
  'Spread the frozen French fries in a single layer on a baking sheet.',
  'Bake the French fries in the preheated oven according to the package instructions until they are crispy and golden brown.',
  'Remove the fries from the oven and sprinkle shredded cheese on top while they are still hot.',
  'Return the fries to the oven for a few minutes, just until the cheese is melted and bubbly.',
  'Take the fries out of the oven and transfer them to a serving dish.',
  'Sprinkle bacon bits and chopped green onions over the cheesy fries.',
  'Drizzle sour cream and ketchup over the toppings.',
  'Season with salt and pepper to taste.',
  'Serve the loaded fries immediately while they are hot and enjoy!'
    ],
false,
false,
false,
false
),
new Meal(
    'm19',
    ['c4'],
    'fried chiken',
    'affordable',
    'difficult',
    'https://www.example.com/dam_phookt.jpg',
    30,
    [
        'Chicken pieces (e.g., drumsticks, thighs, wings)',
        'Buttermilk',
        'All-purpose flour',
        'Salt',
        'Black pepper',
        'Paprika',
        'Garlic powder',

    '1/4 cup Chopped Almonds'
  ],
  [
    'In a heavy-bottomed pan, bring 4 cups of milk to a boil.',
    'Once the milk starts boiling, add lemon juice gradually and stir until the milk curdles and separates from the whey.',
    'Turn off the heat and strain the curdled milk using a muslin cloth or cheesecloth.',
    'Wash the curdled milk under cold water to remove the lemony flavor.',
    'Gather the cloth and squeeze out excess water from the curdled milk. Hang it for 30 minutes to remove any remaining whey.',
    'Meanwhile, in a separate pot, add water and sugar. Bring it to a boil to make the syrup.',
    'Once the sugar syrup is ready, add the strained Rasgulla balls to the syrup.',
    'Cover the pot and cook the Rasgullas in the syrup for 15-20 minutes on medium heat.',
    'In another pan, bring 4 cups of milk to a boil.',
    'Add sugar and cardamom powder to the milk. Stir well.',
    'Turn off the heat and let the milk cool down to room temperature.',
    'Once the milk and Rasgullas are cooled, gently squeeze out the syrup from the Rasgullas.',
    'Place the Rasgullas in the milk mixture and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.',
    'Garnish with chopped pistachios and almonds.',
    'Serve chilled Rasmalai and enjoy!'
  ],

  false,
  false,
  true
